analysis.description:
DigitalThothToken.startDate (/unique_chucks/29/0x43fcf330c317a07c0edc4eff3681f92af6283325.sol#95-97) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/29/0x43fcf330c317a07c0edc4eff3681f92af6283325.sol#223-240)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/29/0x43fcf330c317a07c0edc4eff3681f92af6283325.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/29/0x43fcf330c317a07c0edc4eff3681f92af6283325.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/29/0x43fcf330c317a07c0edc4eff3681f92af6283325.sol#73-74) is not in mixedCase
